summary: Molly, a highschooler, secretly earns her living as Angel, a street prostitute whose only family and friends are the ones she works with on the streets. She has to survive against a serial killer who is targeting people of her profession.
cast: Cliff Gorman|Susan Tyrrell|Dick Shawn|Rory Calhoun|Donna Wilkes|John Diehl|Elaine Giftos|Donna McDaniel|Graem McGavin|Mel Carter|Steven M. Porter|David Underwood|David Anthony|Joshua Cadman|Greg Lewis|Karyn Parker|Dennis Kort|Ken Olfson|Peter Jason|Gene Ross|Jackie De Rouen|Laura Sorrenson|Joseph Michael Cala|Donna Fuller|Ross Hagen|Robert Acey|Dick Valentine|Marc Hayashi|Bob Gorman|Todd Hoffman|Christian Dante|Major 'Govinda Datta' Black|Gaura Sarana Das|Radhanath Das|Vaiyasaki Das|Vatsala Das|Bhagavati Devi Dasi|Locanapadma Devi Dasi|Brian Gusse|Tajah Neubo
title: Angel
